mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE HH_BANK_CARD ( NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , ENABLED CHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y' CHECK (ENABLED IN ('Y', 'N')) , BC CHAR(1) CHECK(BC IN ('B', 'C', 'O')) , NAME TEXT(32) NOT NULL , BANK_KIND TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE CHAR(1) DEFAULT NULL CHECK (BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE IN ('O', 'T', 'R', 'F')) , BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , BANK_ACCOUNT_HOLDER TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , CARD_COMPANY TEXT(16) DEFAULT NULL , CARD_TYPE CHAR(1) DEFAULT NULL CHECK (CARD_TYPE IN ('C', 'H', 'P', 'G', 'I', 'O')) , CARD_BANK_CARD_NO INTEGER DEFAULT -1 , CARD_WITHDRAWAL_DATE INTEGER DEFAULT 0 , DSCR TEXT(128) DEFAULT NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS RES FROM HH_BANK_CARD WHERE 1=1 AND ENABLED = 'Y' AND BC = #{bc, typeHandler=com.utime.household.environment.handler.BankCardTypeHandler} AND NAME = #{name}

SELECT NO , BC , NAME , BANK_KIND , BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE , BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER , BANK_ACCOUNT_HOLDER , CARD_COMPANY , CARD_TYPE , CARD_BANK_CARD_NO , CARD_WITHDRAWAL_DATE , DSCR FROM HH_BANK_CARD WHERE NO = #{no}
